body: She does not like a zombie at all -.-

@Blankroom : it actually more like a joke skit than something dark. Ah, I totally missed that possibility about the disease not being real (she's just that kind who identify herself as zombie, like chuunibyou). The friend did yelled at her saying she's lying (p3), but the story itself doesn't confirm or deny about her condition.
@minminazusa there's a tl version of the first few pages. You make it sound darker than it actually is. She just tricked him into saying he'd be there for her she's actually fine.
Dark skinned zombie girl. Man i'll cum lots!!!

She's the one who's being aggressive. The zombie thing is treated as a disease, where the victim gradually turns into a zombie, losing their mind. He told her he will help her to not forget she is alive. She take that as having sex, and her endurance is like a zombie (like, she keep on going, and he even doubted if what she said before about losing her senses is even true).
I don't understand a thing but looks wholesome
